channel.title: ------lonelysouls718.com-------
channel.description:
Well, have you ever wondered what THE best RSPS was? Hmmm.. it's simple.. it's Lonelysouls718! [font=courier]We have 20+ bosses, 5 custom bosses, Daimenheim Dungeoneering, Off-hand Chaotics, Drygores, Death Cape and WAY MORE!!!![/font]
JOIN US TODAY FOR THE ADVENTURE OF A LIFE TIME!!!

YOURS TRULY,
DEVY.

item.title: ------lonelysouls718.com-------
item.dc:creator: @Master_Luke Master_Luke
item.description:
@Master_Luke wrote:

Please take this down before a mod or admin gets upset with you.

If you’ve read the forum rules you’ll see that only OWNERS of their SERVER is allowed to advertise their server. If you wish to promote their server, please refer to their thread they already have Here

Thanks,

Master_Luke

PS. Not trying to be rude, just trying to prevent you from getting in trouble on these forums, since it says you’re a first time poster
